title: Most popular leisure activities among adults in the U.S. 2013
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 10 number of Responses.
The maximum Share of respondents 42.0 is found at Response Watch TV and the minimum is found at Gardening where Share of respondents is 7.0.
The lowest value at Response Gardening is 6.0x times less than the highest value at Watch TV.
